HeroSection.description: 5 වසරකට වැඩි අත්දැකීම් සහිත, ලොව පුරා රටවල් 25කට වැඩි ගණනක ඉහළම සේවායෝජකයින් සමඟ දක්ෂ වෘත්තිකයන් සම්බන්ධ කරන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ප්‍රමුඛතම රැකියා ඒජන්සිය
HeroSection.videoCaption: How to find a foreign job the easy way

StatsSection.title: Our Track Record Speaks
StatsSection.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to excellence and success in connecting careers with opportunities.

ServicesSection.title: අපගේ සේවාවන්
ServicesSection.subtitle: රැකියාවක් සොයා දීමේ සිට උසස්වීම් දක්වා, ඔබේ වෘත්තීය සිහින සැබෑ කරගැනීමට, අපි සම්පූර්ණ මගපෙන්වීම සහ සහාය ලබාදෙන්නෙමු!
ServicesSection.jobPlacementDescription: ක්ෂේත්‍ර ගනනවක සේවායෝජකයින් සමගින් සහ ඔබගේ සිහින රැකියාව සුරක්ශිත කරගන්න.
ServicesSection.recruitmentDescription: ඔබේ ව්‍යාපාරයට ඉහළම දක්ෂතා එක් කිරීමට අපගේ සම්පූර්ණ හා ආකර්ෂණීය බඳවා ගැනීමේ සේවා!
ServicesSection.skillsTrainingDescription: ඔබේ වෘත්තීය අනාගතය ඉහළ නැංවීමට නිර්මාණය කළ වෘත්තීය සංවර්ධන වැඩසටහන්
ServicesSection.internationalPlacementDescription: වීසා සමගින් අන්තර්ජාතික රැකියා අවස්ථා සපුරලීම සහ ස්තීර පදිංචිය
ServicesSection.careerCounselingDescription: ඔබගේ වෘත්තීය ජීවිතයේ තීරණ ගැනීමට විශේෂඥ උපදෙස්
ServicesSection.corporateSolutionsDescription: ආයතන හා ව්‍යාපාරික සංවිධාන සඳහා අභිරුචි කළ සේවක විසඳුම්.
corporateSolutionsFeatures: කොන්ත්‍රාත් පදනම මත සේවකයන් ලබා දීම

CTASection.title: ඔබේ වෘත්තිය ජීවිතය දියුනු කරගැනීමට ඔබ සූදානම්ද
CTASection.subtitle: අපගේ විශේෂඥ මගපෙන්වීම සහ ගෝලීය ජාලය සමඟ තම වෘත්තීය ජීවිතය සාර්ථකව ඉදිරියට ගෙන ගිය දහස් ගණනක වෘත්තිකයන් සමඟ ඔබත් එක්වන්න.
CTASection.footer: ✓ නොමිලේ උපදේෂශනය • ✓ වෘත්තීය මගපෙන්වීම • ✓ ජාත්‍ය්න්තර අවස්තා

Footer.description: 15 වසරකට වැඩි අත්දැකීම් සහිත, ලොව පුරා රටවල් 25කට වැඩි ගණනක ඉහළම සේවායෝජකයින් සමඟ දක්ෂ වෘත්තිකයන් සම්බන්ධ කරන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ප්‍රමුඛතම රැකියා ඒජන්සිය

ServicesPage.headerSubtitle: Comprehensive career and recruitment solutions tailored to your needs
ServicesPage.heroSubtitle: From job placement to career development, we offer comprehensive solutions to help individuals and organizations achieve their goals.
ServicesPage.aboutParagraph1: With over 15 years of experience in international recruitment, SIN Manpower has established itself as a trusted partner for both job seekers and employers worldwide. Our expertise spans across multiple industries and countries, making us your gateway to global career opportunities.
ServicesPage.aboutParagraph2: We specialize in connecting talented professionals with leading organizations across 25+ countries, ensuring perfect matches that benefit both parties. Our comprehensive approach covers everything from initial consultation to post-placement support.
ServicesPage.missionText: To bridge the gap between talent and opportunity by providing world-class recruitment services that transform careers and businesses globally.
ServicesPage.visionText: To be the leading international manpower solution provider, recognized for our excellence, integrity, and commitment to client success.
ServicesPage.servicesPortfolioSubtitle: We provide end-to-end solutions for all your career and recruitment needs
ServicesPage.processSubtitle: A systematic approach to delivering exceptional results
ServicesPage.testimonialsSubtitle: Hear from our satisfied clients about their experience with our services
ServicesPage.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today to discuss how our services can help you achieve your goals.

AboutPage.aboutSubtitle: පිටරට රැකියාවක් සොයා ගැනීමේ ඔබේ විශ්වාසනීය සහකරුවා
AboutPage.heroParagraph1: Since 2009, SIN Manpower has been at the forefront of international recruitment, helping thousands of professionals find their dream careers while assisting organizations in building world-class teams.
AboutPage.heroParagraph2: We specialize in connecting talented professionals with leading organizations across 25+ countries, ensuring perfect matches that benefit both parties. Our comprehensive approach covers everything from initial consultation to post-placement support.
AboutPage.missionText: To bridge the gap between talent and opportunity by providing world-class recruitment services that transform careers and businesses globally. We are committed to excellence, integrity, and creating lasting value for all stakeholders in the recruitment ecosystem.
AboutPage.visionText: To be the leading international manpower solution provider, recognized for our excellence, innovation, and commitment to client success. We envision a world where geographical boundaries don't limit career aspirations and business growth.
AboutPage.valueProfessionalExcellenceDesc: We maintain the highest standards in all our services, ensuring quality outcomes for every client.
AboutPage.valueIntegrityTransparencyDesc: Honest communication and ethical practices form the foundation of all our relationships.
AboutPage.valueClientCentricDesc: Your success is our priority. We tailor our services to meet your unique needs and goals.
AboutPage.valueGlobalPerspectiveDesc: With international expertise, we connect talent across borders and cultures seamlessly.
AboutPage.ourJourneySubtitle: Key milestones in our growth and evolution
AboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have trusted us with their career aspirations.

JobsPage.headerSubtitle: Discover opportunities from top employers worldwide
JobsPage.noJobsHint: Try adjusting your filters to see more results

ContactPage.headerSubtitle: Get in touch with our expert team for personalized assistance

ContactPage.heroSubtitle: Whether you're seeking international career opportunities or looking to hire top talent, our team is here to help you achieve your goals.
ContactPage.contactSectionSubtitle: Multiple ways to reach us for your convenience

ContactPage.mapDescription: Visit us at our headquarters in Kochchikade

q1.question: රට රැකියාවකට යන්න දින කීයක් යයිද?
q1.answer: ඇතුළත් කිරීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය සාමාන්‍යයෙන් රැකියාව සහ වීසා අවශ්‍යතා මත 2-8 සතියක් ගනී. අපි සම්පූර්ණ ක්‍රියාවලිය පුරා ඔබට යාවත්කාලීන කරනු ඇත.

q2.question: Do you charge job seekers for your services?
q2.answer: No, our job placement services are completely free for job seekers. We are compensated by the employers who hire our candidates.

q3.question: Which countries do you place candidates in?
q3.answer: We have partnerships in 25+ countries including UAE, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Singapore, Canada, Australia, UK, and many more.

q4.question: Do you provide visa assistance?
q4.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive visa assistance including documentation support, application guidance, and interview preparation.
